foods.foodDescription: A delicious chicken leg! Restores 5 health points and scores you 123 points.
Mmm, tasty pizza! Wonder who it belonged to. Restores 8 health points and scores you 600 points
A juicy burger stack with all the fillngs you could want! Restores 10 health points and scores you 780 points.
A luxurious A5 Wagyu steak, perfectly marbled and melts in your mouth. Restores 10 health points and scores you 1000 points.
A perfectly seared steak, tender and full of flavor. Restores 7 health points and scores you 500 points.
A buttery, soft croissant that melts in your mouth. Restores 5 health points and scores you 150 points.
A crispy slice of golden-brown toast. 3 health points and scores you 90 points.
A delicious slice of cheese! Honestly who doesn't like cheese? Restores 8 health points and scores you 600 points.
A fresh and juicy tomato, bursting with flavor. So healthy! Restores 5 health points and scores you 300 points.
A refreshing slice of watermelon, perfect for quenching your thirst! Restores 7 health points and scores you 500 points.
A delicate roll of Maki, filled with fresh ingredients. Restores 10 health points and scores you 1200 points.
Crispy and golden, Tempura brings a satisfying crunch to every bite. Restores 8 health points and scores you 500 points.
